Meet FLUX

Your Motion Graphics Producer

FLUX creates stunning video content that captures attention and drives engagement. From product explainers to social clips, bring your story to life.

Configure FLUX

What FLUX Can Do

Professional video production that scales with your content needs.

Product Explainers

Create engaging animated videos that showcase your product features and benefits in a clear, compelling way.

Social Video Cuts

Transform long-form content into bite-sized clips optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.

Motion Graphics

Add professional motion graphics, transitions, and visual effects that elevate your video content.

Multi-Format Export

Automatically generate videos in multiple aspect ratios and formats for every platform you publish on.

Video Types

FLUX creates various video formats for different use cases

Product Explainers

2-3 minute animated videos that clearly communicate your value proposition

Social Media Clips

15-60 second vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts

Tutorial Videos

Step-by-step walkthroughs that help users get the most from your product

Promotional Videos

High-impact videos for product launches, announcements, and campaigns

Every video project includes these deliverables

1080p & 4K exports
